attributes.action: make perscription charges the same throughout the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As we have a National Health Service in the UK and we all contribute to this through our taxes then the charges for persriptions should be the same for all.The Citizen's Advice Bureau have warned that many can not afford the medicines they need. It is unfair that patients in England have their charges increased, when in Wales the charges have been abolished altogether. If charges within this National Service are different then people in England should have a vote on the decision or otherwise the Welsh Health service should be separately funded

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
